forgotPassword.title: Reset Password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address to receive password reset instructions.
forgotPassword.successMessage: If the email exists, a reset link has been sent.

resetPassword.title: Reset Your Password
resetPassword.newSameAsOld: New password must be different from old password

heroSection.title: Take Control of Your Finances
heroSection.description: Track your income, expenses, and financial goals in one place.

functionalities.title: Key Features
functionalities.subtitle: Explore the main functionalities of our app.
functionalities.incomeDescription: Easily log and monitor your income sources to manage your cash flow.
functionalities.expensesDescription: Keep track of your spending and identify saving opportunities.
functionalities.goalsDescription: Plan your budget and achieve your financial milestones effortlessly.

questions.q: How does Cash Flow help manage my finances?
questions.a: Cash Flow allows you to track your income, expenses, and budget in one place, helping you make informed financial decisions.
Yes! We use advanced encryption and security measures to protect your financial information.

questions.q: Can I export my financial data?
questions.a: Absolutely! You can download your financial records in CSV format for external use.

unauthorized.title: Access Denied
unauthorized.description: You do not have permission to view this page. If you believe this is a mistake, please contact support.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist. It might have been moved or deleted.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.passwordSameAsOld: New password must be different from the old password.
profile.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
profile.profileUpdateFailed: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
